body_html:
I build bazel from source. @kamal94 I would expect that you did as well.

As an early guess, I think I may have built from master of bazel and it may have a few bugs. (For example, if you look at https://www.bazel.io/versions/master/docs/skylark/lib/globals.html, you'll see that HOST_CFG is not listed as a global, but it was before: https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:0KuaX69EkvcJ:https://www.bazel.io/versions/master/docs/skylark/lib/globals.html+&cd=3&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=us)

Here is what may be the source of the line 91 protobuf error:

https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/blob/8d9fc9aef82d82076cfea2db010a3036d871027e/third_party/protobuf/3.0.0/protobuf.bzl#L91

As an early guess, I think I may have built from master of bazel and it may have a few bugs.
